Bag O' Links - 3/5/2009

Rails Conf is on the way… enjoy you all.

  • Rubist Linklist for April – Some links about ruby, rails and the world.
  • RestfulX Framwork – a cool way to develop restuful Adobe AIR and Flex applications, there is even a nice tutorial for getting it started with Rails.
  • Rails is good for you – 4 reasons why.
  • i hate the Rails Maturity model – Another RMM hater, i get this feeling up my spine too.
  • Making beautiful stylesheets – do it rite.
  • Rails and indexing your database – i think i already posted this link before, just wanted to point out that i was working on something rails generator enhancement (primarily created by @MikeG1) that adds some spice to the current script/generate model pot. Currently it’s called ModelPlus (Usage notes here), i love it.
